verses.roman:
prabhu dekhi' paḍe āge daṇḍavat hañā
prabhu āliṅgana kaila tāṅre uṭhāñā

synonyms: prabhu dekhi'-after seeing the Lord; paḍe—fell down; āge—in front of Him; daṇḍavat—flat like a stick; hañā—becoming; prabhu—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; āliṅgana kaila—embraced; tāṅre—him; uṭhāñā—raising him up.
translation: As soon as Haridāsa Ṭhākura saw Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, he immediately fell down like a stick to offer Him obeisances, and Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu raised him up and embraced him.
